overview: Birju Ka Neela Pani is a Fiction Short Film, Open defecation is a dirty spot on the face of our mother nature. Some people take pride in open defecation because of their habit & nature. Through this movie director has tried to hurt the ego of those people who take pride in open defecation. Now it is time for strict action rather than sweet talk.
tagline: Now it is time for strict action rather than sweet talk
title: Birju Ka Neela Pani
